name: get_mandi_prices_today
description: Use this tool to get the latest mandi (agricultural market) prices for all available commodities for the current date. You must provide the state and district.

state.description: The full name of the state, e.g., 'Uttar Pradesh', 'Punjab'.

district.description: The full name of the district, e.g., 'Kanpur Nagar', 'Ludhiana'.
